testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.title: Ignition spark test

test1.ptxt: Check all spark plugs for condition and type referring to Spark Plug Inspection:M16A and J20A .
If OK, perform ignition spark test referring to Ignition Spark Test:M16A and J20A .

testgroup.question: Is spark emitted from all spark plugs?

test1.ptxt: Perform DTC check referring to DTC Check:M16A and J20A .

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

test1.ptxt: Check ignition coil assemblies and high-tension cords (for M16A engine) for electrical connection.

action.ptxt: Go to Step 5 for M16A engine or go to Step 6 for J20A engine.

test1.ptxt: Check high-tension cord for resistance referring to High-Tension Cord Inspection (M16A):M16A and J20A .

testgroup.title: Ignition coil assembly power supply and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check ignition coil assembly power supply and ground circuits for open and short.

testgroup.question: Are circuits in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check ignition coil for resistance referring to Ignition Coil Assembly (Including ignitor) Inspection:M16A and J20A .
Check CKP sensor referring to Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A .

paragroup.ptxt: Tighten CKP sensor bolt, replace CKP sensor or CKP sensor plate.

test1.ptxt: Check CMP sensor referring to Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A .

action.ptxt: Tighten CMP sensor bolt, replace CMP sensor or intake camshaft.

test1.ptxt: Check ignition trigger signal wire for open, short and poor connection.

testgroup.title: A known-good ignition coil assembly substitution

test1.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ignition coil assembly and then repeat Step 2.

testgroup.question: Is check result of Step 2 satisfactory?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and then repeat Step 2.

test1.ptxt: Check initial ignition timing and ignition timing advance referring to Ignition Timing Inspection:M16A and J20A .
Confirm that knock sensor circuit is in good condition referring to DTC P0327 / P0328: Knock Sensor Circuit Low / High:M16A and J20A .
Check oscilloscope waveform of knock sensor signal referring to “Reference waveform No.26” and “Reference waveform No.27” under Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits:M16A and J20A .

action.ptxt: Check CMP sensor, CMP sensor rotor tooth of camshaft, CKP sensor, CKP sensor plate and/or input signals related to this system.
Substitute a known-good knock sensor and recheck.
